title: ADR for canonical routing
description:
Define one canonical route table, alias policy, and deprecation timeline.

Acceptance: Single canonical route table documented; legacy aliases and deprecation date approved.
Validation: PR review checklist

title: Unify shell and router contracts
description:
Make LearningShell and hash router consume the same canonical route definitions.

Acceptance: Canonical routes implemented: hoy,sesion,cierre,evaluacion,modulos,progreso; legacy redirects preserved.
Validation: node --test app/web/js/tests/routes.test.mjs; node --test app/web/js/tests/hash_router.test.mjs; node --test app/web/js/tests/view_switcher.test.mjs

title: Freeze content/runtime contract v4.1
description:
Create schema v4.1 and compatibility notes for v4 to v4.1 migration.

Acceptance: schema.v4.1 and contract guide published; enum and integrity rules frozen.
Validation: Schema validation on week*.v4.json

title: Build curriculum integrity validator
description:
Implement script that checks CEFR drift, prompt resolution, resource locator completeness, and empty sessions.

Acceptance: Validator returns non-zero exit on P0 and outputs machine-readable report.
Validation: python3 scripts/validate_curriculum_integrity.py --repo-root .

title: Enable CI blocker for P0 findings
description:
Wire audit command with fail-on-p0 into CI and block merge when P0 > 0.

Acceptance: CI job fails when audit detects P0 issues and status is required for merge.
Validation: CI run with python3 /Users/dfernandez/.codex/skills/english-sprint-architect/scripts/audit_english_sprint.py --repo-root . --fail-on-p0

title: ADR for single CSS entrypoint
description:

Acceptance: CSS entrypoint decision approved with migration plan.
Validation: PR review checklist

title: Implement single CSS entrypoint
description:
Apply selected entrypoint in app/web/index.html and align stylesheet chain.

Acceptance: App loads through one entrypoint; no critical regression on desktop/mobile.
Validation: Manual smoke desktop/mobile

title: Create P0 remediation queue for S1-S2

Acceptance: All current P0 findings mapped to actionable tasks with acceptance criteria.
